text: Mignon in 2012. Jean-Claude Mignon (born February 2, 1950) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Seine-et-Marne department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. On 23 January 2012, he was elected President of the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Claude Mignon
